item.title: MIUI V12.0.4.0.QJCCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9 China

Codename: lancelot

Version: V12.0.4.0.QJCCNXM | 10.0

Size: 3.0 GB

MD5: fe7e8523fe1d77fe8d6e219729651524

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to September 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QJCIDXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9 Indonesia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9 Indonesia

Codename: lancelot

Version: V12.0.1.0.QJCIDXM | 10.0

Size: 3.8 GB

MD5: 0544e663c5aae330d93b88712c088718

Changelog:
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: When Notification shade is open, swipe down from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[System]
Optimization: Updated Android Security Patch to November 2020. Increased system security.
Fix: Home screen went black and started flashing after unlocking in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Screen lights up with an animation now
New: Status bar color gradient animation

Download: Here
